name: Phylactery
description:
Phylactery is a Dark, Turn-Based Dungeon Crawler. Using the resources you gain from dungeons you must rebuild your town and increase the strength of your party. You play as a party of three, Cleric, Mage and Warrior. They are the last hope for a Great Town taken by an evil Lich. You must use each member's special abilities to Cast, Cleanse and Clash your way to new resources with the goal of rebuilding the place you once called home.

Features

  • Upgradable buildings in a town hub. Each building has stats that are directly tied to a member of your party. Use your resources to upgrade the building thus empowering the member of your party that is associated.
  • Non-linear dungeon order, the player can choose any dungeon to play through at any time without worrying about following a specific order.
  • As the party progresses further into the dungeon their yield will increase greatly! The more rooms conquered in a dungeon, the more loot you take back to town.
